abstract: The appearance by Marc Benioff, chief executive of Salesforce.com, at Oracle OpenWorld was cancelled, perhaps because of comments he made about the Oracle chief executive's speech.
snippet: The appearance by Marc Benioff, chief executive of Salesforce.com, at Oracle OpenWorld was cancelled, perhaps because of comments he made about the Oracle chief executive's speech.
lead_paragraph: 11:52 p.m. | Updated Added comment from Oracle.Marc Benioff, chief executive of Salesforce.com and a once-close protege of Oracle chief executive Larry Ellison, says he has been removed from the lineup of speakers at tomorrow's Oracle OpenWorld conference.
